channel.title: MySQL Highscores help
channel.description:
I have 1 problem with adding highscores to my server (that I know of) On my server (PI) it says it cannot find this symbol: [code]conn = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/highscores", "root", "blank");[/code]
Solutions anyone?
